heading: Sunken Ruins Dungeon Guide
content: Sunken Ruins is fast dungeon with no boss, and the extremely important Barbarian aspect, . The layout is small so this can potentially be an easy Nightmare Dungeon, but the tight corridors might not be to your liking. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
